surface_layer.definition: Operating System, a software that manages computer hardware and software resources and provides common services for computer programs.

deep_layer.mechanism: Provides an abstraction layer between hardware and software, enabling applications to run without knowing the specifics of the hardware.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from early batch processing systems to modern multi-user, multitasking systems.

epistemic_metadata.source: Microprocessor 5: Software and Hardware Aspects of Development
